website_summaries.verdict: A lot of issues with this bottle and pump have been noted, but the bodywash stands out for its superior organic and vegan ingredients. You also get a lot of product for a reasonable price.
pros: Rich formula with a pleasant scent that contains lavender oil
Free of harsh and artificial ingredients
cons: Subpar packaging, as the pump is flimsy and prone to breaking, and the bottle frequently leaks during shipping

customer_reviews.title: Highly not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients listed on the page do not include all the ingredients listed on the item. This item does include PRESERVATIVES such as sodium sorbate. Highly not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: om1991

customer_reviews.title: Best shower gel EVER aromatherapy experience smells amazing all natural essential oils leaves skin super soft.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite body wash ever hands down. I used to have their lotion in lavender and loved it. So I was so happy to find this stuff. Avalon organics lavender is so potent and has that real lavender smell. This body wash is practically half essential oils, it cleans my skin but never leaves it feeling stripped. I've tried other body washes, like kiss my face, while smelling good it dried my skin out and left a residue feeling on my skin. Not with this stuff. It smells amazing and it's all natural essential oils not synthetic fragrance or anything. It's an aromatherapy experience every time you use it and it will leave your skin feeling super soft.
customer_reviews.author: dreamlandia

customer_reviews.title: There are only, like, 7 organic ingredients in this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product so I could save time/space in the shower and wash my daughter with the same soap that I use (she is 100% organic/vegan, I eat like a dumpster) but it's not organic, it only contains some organic ingredients. So, now I have to keep two separate products in the shower anyways; plus this seems to be drying my hands out, so I'm sure my body isn't far behind :(
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Rice

customer_reviews.title: Using gel-like substance, to create more liquid volume and profit
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for 2 years, but will no longer purchase. They now use gel-like substance to produce more volume, just like what you’ll find at gym showers, but not as bad. You’ll notice needing a lot more liquid than your regular bodywash.
customer_reviews.author: Dellon S

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin. Avalon Organics have wonderful products that don't irritate my skin. However, there was a problem the last time I ordered this bath & shower gel in July 2017 -- they sent me Alba product instead of Avalon. I can't use Alba. I am hoping they have this labeling problem corrected because I plan on purchasing more Avalon Organics Bath and Shower Gel.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Glory

customer_reviews.title: It smells like you're in a Lavender field.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is absolutely divine and smells just like the real thing! So while it does feel and smell nice when I shower, the smell doesn't linger for too long afterwards which is rather disappointing but understandable. Another thing I'd like to point out is this is a shower gel instead of a wash so a lot does come out and is needed in order to make it start to foam up but I still have plenty after a few months so it lasts quite a while. It does a pretty good job at moisturizing my body compared to some other products as well as neutralizing odors for a few hours after use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great product though
customer_reviews.text: 4 ounces leak out was not packed right by Company 😩 This soap is already expensive. Great product though
customer_reviews.author: Eagle Eye

customer_reviews.title: Damaged In Shipping
customer_reviews.text: I like the lavender-scented soap. I am using this product as I am sensitive to other soaps and this one has worked well for me. My only issue is with the shipping. The pump head was broken off on one bottle and both bottles leaked into their plastic bags. I will return to purchasing this product through VitaCost for a tiny bit more $, but bottles were well protected from breakage and leaking.
customer_reviews.author: P Roeth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Watered down product
customer_reviews.text: While the quantity you get for the price is good, this is NOT the same of this product I have used before. It is watered down or something. Very watery no viscosity or thickness at all. The scent would also seem to back up my claim.... not much scent at all! Very disappointed but can’t return this item I guess due to COVID or maybe just because it’s a personal hygiene item. Not a lot of money to lose but still wanted the product to be quality like it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping preparation.
customer_reviews.text: The product smelled great, but it was because it wasn’t packaged well. The cap wasn’t screwed on tight. I’m pretty sure when it was shrink wrapped, the cap wasn’t tight to begin with. Some of the product leaked out. It smelled amazing though inside the box. The scent was strong enough to leak out of the sealed box. This is actually the replacement since the original one had the same issue. 🤷🏻‍♂️🤦🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural, lovely aroma
customer_reviews.text: I am a migraine sufferer and I am very sensitive to smells, particularly to those with perfume as an ingredient. Perfume is in basically everything, even in things marked natural or with essential oils. But this has a beautiful, deep scent all of its own that permeates the room. It is in no way overpowering, simply deep, and there is no perfume. I cannot tell you how wonderful it is to be able to experience scent again! For ages all I could buy was unscented products, which tend to be expensive, or those that have some perfume, which physically hurts. This is so freeing and relaxing, like I can finally let my guard down. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: User737

customer_reviews.title: Despite angry hippys it's a good product
customer_reviews.text: Lots of negative reviews about all the hippy ingredients and whatever. Don't know about all that and don't care. Never felt cleaner in my life. And it doesn't make me feel filmy. It definitely does seem to take more liquid to do the job than traditional gels. But its not ridiculous. Still lasts plenty long.
customer_reviews.author: Vatolicious

customer_reviews.title: This is not the same product I have used before.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who to blame for the fact that the product I received is very watery and has hardly any scent. I have enjoyed Avalon Organics Lavender Body Wash for years, but the bottle I received in 2020 is a huge disappointment. Is there a change in the formula by the manufacturer or is this the result of fraud by the wholesaler? In any case, I will not be buying this product from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: SarahtimDC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product; thick shower gel trusted brand!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product-I don’t understand the negative reviews. This is one of the top 2 best body washes I have ever found. Product has never been watered down and always arrived in excellent condition! Lasts a long time and smells great...pump is super easy to use! The price is a bargain for this type of product. I will update this review if there is a problem but our family has always been very happy with Avalon Organics.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Excellent body wash/shower gel for the price! Smells nice, gets nice and foamy when lathered into my scalp and doesn’t leave my head, face and hair dry afterwards like so many “common” brands of body wash do. Not sure about some people’s complaints, mine arrived well packaged with zero leaking, also what’s with the complaints about it being a gel like substance? It literally says shower GEL on the bottle, in plain English lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Big rip-off
customer_reviews.text: Although I should've known better than to purchase something of this size, which seemed too good to be true, I did anyway. The product is watery. It takes a TON of it to affect anything you try to use it for. Although the scent is mildly pleasant, it is weak and doesn't last long at all. NO moisturizing benefits whatsoever. DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT. I want my money back, little as it may be.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Bastedo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice big size bottle for the price. I have not broken out, I seem to have become sensitive to a lot of soaps, and was paying $13 to $20 for 3 bars of natural soap at whole foods. So this is working pretty good so far and it will last a lot longer. I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 because of the texture... it's more watery. I guess I expected it to be thicker like hand soap or other body washes. However my skin is doing great with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: If you like the smell of lavender and don’t have sensitive skin, this stuff will work. I bought this thinking it would be a bit more gentle than most soaps and lotions I’ve tried, but it wasn’t. I have small patches of eczema that aren’t too bad and my skin is not sensitive to the point of breaking out in a rash or anything, but my skin definitely became tight, dry, and irritated after using only a small amount. As far as body wash goes, it does the job. My mom actually likes it, but I will not be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cala Free

customer_reviews.title: Very watery.
customer_reviews.text: I think product works well, but very watery. When you pump into your hands it is like putting water in your hands. Very thin. So cant say value for money when it is watered down product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and Soothing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this body wash for a week, usually before bed because the lavender scent has calming properties. Finally a product that does not dry my skin, it actually moisturizes my skin while cleansing it. The bottle pumps out a good amount so you don't need to pump multiple times. It also arrived very 2 days (during covid-19)!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Smells quite bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the stated lavender smell and because of the price and amount that you get. However, I cannot stand the smell. It smells very medicinal. I have never had that experience with some thing that states that it is lavender in scent. I am not even using it.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for me!
customer_reviews.text: Well this body wash is a disappointment i feel like i am not clean with this, takes a bunch of pumps for me to feel like i made enough lather to wash my body. I love alba products better they very rich in lather and moisture. But they arrived well packaged!!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing and I smell amazing now too :-D. The only issue is the packaging. It leaked in shipping and for the price I definitely don't want to lose any. It looks like they attempted to fix this issue with plastic over the top, but it looks like it came out around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Too Watery to be called a Gel.
customer_reviews.text: Usually, Avalon is a great product. But not this one. Shower “Gel” isn’t watery like this product. In reading reviews, the quality of this product has changed and it’s become very watery - too watery to be called a gel. I’m not happy, cannot recommend and won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rubeslippr

customer_reviews.title: Too runny
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit too runny for my liking. And thr sprout is always clogged by the soap many times the soap just squirted everywhere when I tried to pump it. The only thing I like is the scent. It is not moisturizing enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia C.

customer_reviews.title: Ewww!! STINKY!!
customer_reviews.text: I would return this but it's natural it is hard to come by soap of any kind these days. This product if it has any lavender smell to it I can't tell because it's really tart, scent wise So far I've only wash my hands with it. Just be aware that is not a lavender, sweet, flowery sort of scent
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash, love the smell and it doesn't strip your skin. I feel clean and it doesn't leave a strong sent behind.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Works well on the face and body!
customer_reviews.text: The smell could be a little more feminine; it is a very herbal lavender smell. Other then that it's great! Leaves my skin clear and soft, and it doesn't a m to get as oily during the course of the day. I use it on my face and body and it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: C Novak

customer_reviews.title: Amazon packed it properly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Just want to thank amazon for packaging these 3 large bottles carefully & putting them each in individually wrapped zip locks. Ive had it with my liquid orders showing up like a bomb went off inside the box & loosing the product. This product is awesome. Its organic, bless them for that and the price was slashed so deep I swiped up 3 of them. Well done amazon. Avalon is consistent with Goodness, so satisfied as usual with them. Personal preference, I add a few drops of my own lavender essential oil & it reboots the lavender while adding another lavender tone to it. Glorious.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E. Borden

customer_reviews.title: NSF Certified. Vegan. Biodegradable. And, it smells great. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find organic body soap like this, especially NSF certified ones. This stuff lasts a long time. My wife and I only buy one every 3 months or so. We use it in a loofa. If you put in right in your hand it will take like 3-4x the amount of soap to cover your body. However, if you use a loofa or sea sponge, you only need two pumps for your whole body.
customer_reviews.author: KennyNashville

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing and calming
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. The only thing was- I trouble opening it. Maybe it’s me. Idk!!! But besides that... I ❤️ It. I never liked Lavender until of of my daughters gave me as gifts for my bday a spa set that was lavender and honey. Now, I like lavender 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Camacho

customer_reviews.title: terrible packaging. It looked used.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the one I bought at whole foods.. this one however arrived open and seemed to be diluted.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: like this body wash
customer_reviews.text: was trying to find something that was good, and not too expensive. This fit the bill. Leaves your skin feeling moisturized and clean. Wasn't bad in the price range either. I would try this again. The scent is wonderful, do love the lavender.
customer_reviews.author: Bre Branco

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: I used this product every day for over 10 years and loved it. But in the last year or so, they've been watering down their product by A LOT so it's like you're paying the same price for 1/2 the quantity. It also means you need twice as much product to clean yourself as before, so you're going through the bottles faster which is putting more plastic into the oceans. Anyways, won't be buying this anymore :(
customer_reviews.author: avocado

customer_reviews.title: I love Avalon products and this is no different
customer_reviews.text: I love Avalon products and this is no different! I was disappointed because the lid had come loose and some of the shampoo had escaped and was a mess to have to clean up. I kept it because I love the product and didn't want the hassle of trying to send it back. The same thing happened with the Avalon lotion ordered at the same time but the pump had come up and lid was loose. Thank goodness it was in plastic bag because lotion was everywhere and a real mess to clean up. Only lost about an ounce. of shampoo and 2 oz of lotion. Again product is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cox

customer_reviews.title: Watery and doesn’t feel good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells great. I do not like the feeling of it or how watery it is. You end up using ten pumps because it is runny and doesn’t stay in your hand/in your poof. I wouldn’t buy this again. Dr. Teals is better.
customer_reviews.author: GEArHEAd

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasing smell and my wife's skin feel oh so soft. I would highly recommend buying this as it does a great job and the scent lasts. Clean, fresh, and very seductive. What are you waiting for, buy some today!
customer_reviews.author: RubAnADUB

customer_reviews.title: Contains alcohol and Coco Glucoside, which is derived from coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not researching the ingredients first, so I don’t blame the company. Coconut oil gives fabulous lather, but is also among the harshest oils. If your skin is sensitive to coconut oil, you might find it on the drying side. I’m also disappointed that it contains alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged and not so good product
customer_reviews.text: It came in a small plastic bag and the body gel was leaked all over the bag. This brand needs a solution to this packaging issue. I see that a lot of people had experienced the same issue here. I suggest them to put a safety seal on the bottle so it won't leak, very simple. I wonder why they are not doing that. The body gel is so watery and wouldn't foam well like I'd like it to be. I wouldn't buy again because of the packaging issue. and low-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: bom ei

customer_reviews.title: Defective pump and liquid everywhere in packaging
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sticky and with the pump not working. Was so disappointed I lost so much money buying this defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, not a gel as might be expected.  Pump bottle is too large and heavy for suction rack.
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a large bottle, it is very thin and runny, not the gel that I expected. It's enough for only 20 or so showers. It's very large and heavy, so I had to pour some of it into another dispenser bottle in order to place it in the suction rack in my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Etcetera

customer_reviews.title: It was broken
customer_reviews.text: When i received the product it was broken and some liquid spills all over the box.
customer_reviews.author: dlayla

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the smell of relaxing essential oils. Smells like cleaning solution. Liquid consistency not good for body wash. Doesn't leave clean feel and scent quickly fades
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend Avalon organic lavender bath & shower gel
customer_reviews.text: While it does lather and clean, I find this bath and shower gel to be too watery, drying to my skin, and the lavender scent very unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Watery!!! Watered down!! Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS.. I read in some reviews that it was super watered down but it had enough good reviews for me to go ahead and purchase it because I had heard good things. This body wash is so watery that it won’t even stay in my hand in order to apply to my body and if I use a loofa I have to use way too many pumps. It makes no sense for a body wash to be this liquid-y.... and I’m not able to return it due to the policy. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarir K

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, It last me like 2 months. Nice scent and works well. I jut wish it would lather more. But I guess if it didi that they would need to use more chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Bianco Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent, lathers nicely and a little bit will ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scent, lathers nicely and a little bit will do the job so it lasts a long time. A friend recommended this to me and it's one of the best recommendations she has made. The scent did not stay with me but the bathroom smelled wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Bklovr

customer_reviews.title: Delivered promptly exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this fragrant lotion before and was thrilled to find such a good deal on the large bottle. I would purchase from this seller again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia_L

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Pump sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! Smell is good and relaxing. Gave 3 stars because I had to put product in an old soap dispenser because the pump stayed sealed. I spun it a hundred times in the open direction and even used tools with no luck. And even wasted some product trying to pour it in soap dispenser. Otherwise, great product. Smells amazing. Unisex friendly.
customer_reviews.author: monika

customer_reviews.title: Lavender me to sleep
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely a person who loves to take a good soaking bath and this lavender scented body wash is the relaxing touch I need. Want a good sleep; invest in something lavender scented
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: The product was damage
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in very bad condition, almost empty. The liquid was all over the bag and the box and I can't believe I tried to return it and they said it couldn't be done, so I recommend that you DO NOT BUY IT, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mariangel

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have changed quality
customer_reviews.text: This product seems more watery than it was before, plus I got a rash and can no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Zena Rose

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really smell like lavender. More like regular soap with no real scent. And not particularly moisturizing. Probably won’t order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chatty Cat

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase this when the one I normally buy was out of stock. Pleasantly surprised! Smell reminds me a little bit of like mopping liquid or some sort of cleaning supply at first impression, but it's probably just me.
customer_reviews.author: Ame Liah

customer_reviews.title: Not very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: It smells great. It creates a nice lather. But, it doesn't do much in the way of moisturizing. Follow your shower with lotion. It's a product that leaves you feeling clean though.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Kind of watery. Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Great scent -the problem is its almost like water. You lose it before you get it to your body in the shower. If it were thicker in consistency it would be great
customer_reviews.author: kath

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I hightly recommend this shower gel. The scent is very light (I am allergic to perfume and have had no problems with this product) and pleasant. The gel is gentle on the skin, leaves it feeling moist and smooth rather than dry like most soaps,and it doesn't require much gel to create a nice lather. I have been using this product for over a year (my current order was for a refill)and have found the quality of the product consistent. I highly recommend it, particularly for those who have problems with allergies as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, love it even more for baths!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over 5 years. The lavender essential oil is so calming, and its plant-based formula nourishes and leaves my skin so soft. I used to purchase this product at Whole Foods for triple the price(!!) and then discovered it on Amazon - a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lotion/soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and this is a great value! It’s thick enough to spread but thin enough to not be heavy, and it actually smells like real lavender, not that fake crap. I love this lotion and the soap!
customer_reviews.author: Ally Cat

customer_reviews.title: Lovely boday wash!
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash! It smells nice and light and makes me feel clean! The price is really good as well. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eichelberger

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice body wash. A little thinner than I would have liked. It causes me to use a little more than I need.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scent and produc
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Rich scent and luscious feeling. Will put this on a repeat order for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging issues
customer_reviews.text: I love the product - gave 5 stars in the individual categories. Overall 4 stars because the cap was not screwed on securely on all 3 bottles. Liquid was all over inside the plastic rapping 2 out 3 bottles - approximately 4 oz in 2 out of 3 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Schindler

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The scent isn’t as appealing as I would like it to be. The cleaning ability is ok. I would choose other brands because this is a little overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I ordered twice & both times it LEAKED BADLY! wished they would change the lid so it wouldn't leak. I'm struggling because I want to order again but I'm afraid of losing precious ounces of liquid! I might try to order one last time. Not sure..
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super irritated it arrived leaking lwt alone this bad smells great but who knows how much product was wasted in the damage 😕
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Skorvonek

customer_reviews.title: All around great product!
customer_reviews.text: There are NO dislikes! Price is right, the smell is lovely but not overpowering, and it cleans great.
customer_reviews.author: RenHi

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Does not lather as well as I'd like it to so I have to use a ton of it. Great ingredients, appears to be a green product. May use again, but my search will continue to find something that lathers well in addition to having a great sales model, sustainable and clean ingredients. This did not dry my skin out, so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: M5

customer_reviews.title: Light  scent
customer_reviews.text: It lasts a long time and we shampoo every day . It is mild and smells very nice.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: no suds
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the products lack of fragrance and substance. Watery but no way to lather up in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Product Tampered with
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 10 years. Unfortunately, I bought early and just opened the bottle yesterday. This product had been TAMPERED WITH. The product was runny like water, and there was a thick opaque "glob" of congealed goo in the bottle. I through it away, money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: Watered Down
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this in stores before and it has a gel like consistency. This arrived and is completely watered down, looks like bubble solution through the bottle. Very disappointed. Listen to the other reviews and don’t purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Amazingggg scent
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeee the scent!! Loveeee that aloe Vera juice is so high up on the ingredients list.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: 1 bottle the plastic came off and the body wash got all over everything in the box! Not happy with the fact I had ordered face cradle coverings in the same order. Wish you would package things better or something. This is not the first Time I have had this problem thru your company
customer_reviews.author: Denise cummins

customer_reviews.title: Favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: One of my bathroom staples. Lovely lavender scent, we use this body wash for the entire family. Leathers up nicely and is not drying, even on baby skin.
customer_reviews.author: DTribeofFive

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible scent, not like lavender at all. No smoothing factor during or after use. My hair was like straw after towel drying. Good size bottle, but now stuck with 30 oz. I am going to try to add lavender essential oils to it.
customer_reviews.author: Miri

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not the best was expecting something better but clean and that is what matters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful moisturizer. Makes you feel like you have had a spa day!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Nice and valued shower gel
customer_reviews.text: This shower gel is pretty nice. I love the lavender scent in the shower and its crisp clean feeling. Leaves my skin feeling normal, not overly oily or dry. The price is decent. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: H C

customer_reviews.title: Auhh so clean
customer_reviews.text: Great smell...good cleansing and as natural as can be. Bottle is big, ample supply and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: javier rosete

customer_reviews.title: Rash
customer_reviews.text: I broke out in a full body rash with first wash. I’m rating it low because I can’t return it’
customer_reviews.author: ksymonds

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: At first I did not like the smell, but I gave it a few more tries and now I like it. The product is organic free and is worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good!
customer_reviews.text: Not the same product used at a friend's house and was so impressed with that led me to buying - this is a weak, watered down version, but yes, it still has the great scent. Oddly enough, for being sulfate-free it tends to be very drying. Amazon had it for a good price, but would not buy this version again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product had it arrived safely
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but amazon shipped it poorly. Arrived in a soggy box and lost about 4 ounces of product.
customer_reviews.author: FlwrPwr Chick

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: I love Avalon's products, but wanted to thank Amazon for getting the shipping oh so right this time. First liquid shipment I've received that didn't spill, explode or leak. Kudos to you for not giving up, creative packaging team!
customer_reviews.author: SRT

customer_reviews.title: Good value but does dry out skin
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant scent but is definitely a more drying body wash. I use it when I plan on applying lotion afterwards. Pretty good value given product size and its quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Clean feel
customer_reviews.text: Organic soaps are clean not moisturizing but clean no chemicals that's what I like
customer_reviews.author: Toni Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Top not screwed down properly
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, but top was knot engaged properly so a lot of shampoo wound up in the excess packaging. Just screw it down normally, please
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Where's the lavender???
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's me, but this smells more.like industrial cleaner than lavender. It cleans, but for the price...you can find something cheaper, that smells better and is an overall better value.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin and smell wonderful
customer_reviews.text: What a delicious scent while shower.I have sent I’ve skin and this worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Lavender Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS GEL! Use it for shower,a dash into the bottom of the tub for foot soak. Relaxed, soft and fragrantly lavender at the end of your bath. Generous bottle for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: ScienceRules

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this brand is the only soap I really use anymore. All their stuff is good... peppermint is too strong for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and makes you feel even more so!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never use another product again. I smells amazing and makes me feel even more so!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy C. Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: It is organic and vegan
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday after showering before bedtime. Makes me relax and helps with my dry winter skin.
customer_reviews.author: purple lady bug

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Lavender shower oil
customer_reviews.text: Very soothing shower gel. Does not lather much -I use it after soaking up as a skin conditioner. The lavender scent is natural and nice to use in the evening to promote sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D. Flamer

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell of herbs, I can not tell any difference. lol
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Has Weird Smell and Not Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: They smell is chemically and does not moisturize. So, we use it for hand soap, since it has a weird smell and is drying. I always buy natural or organic soap. This was a miss and I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrineedles

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could write a great review but the body wash is very watery. The fragrance is great but it won't even stay in your hand or on your "scrubby" long enough to get out to your body. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mae L.

customer_reviews.title: It is ok!
customer_reviews.text: Over all it is ok for body wash but the scent is a little too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kana

customer_reviews.title: I was spoiled by lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: It is great, except I had been using a very expensive lavender lotion...this is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: E. Marx

product_meta.title: Avalon Organics Nourishing Lavender Body Wash and Shower Gel, 32 oz
product_meta.description: Gently cleanse and hydrate extra dry skin with Avalon Organics Nourishing Lavender Bath & Shower Gel. Made with organic botanicals and essential oils, this plant-based formula deeply nourishes and moisturizes skin while washing away impurities. Lavender essential oil, quinoa protein and aloe work together to replenish skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple. This EWG VERIFIED body wash is made with non-GMO ingredients and no parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, phthalates or sulfates. It is also vegan and not tested on animals. Includes one 32 oz. bottle of Avalon Organics Nourishing Lavender Bath & Shower Gel. Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.
feature_bullets: Gently cleanses and restores even extra dry skin
Gentle, plant-based bath and shower gel unites botanical cleansers, vitamins and essential oils to purify and nourish skin

For extra dry skin^Aloe, plant proteins & non-drying botanical cleansers purify & replenish while the soothing aroma of lavender essential oil calms the body^NSF/ANSI 305 certified, contains natural & organic ingredients^100% vegetarian formula, no animal testing^NO: parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrance, phthalates or harmful sulfates

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
